arch:property.oc:show_val: Phase V: Late Nabataean CE 1st c. redesign and repairs, including the addition of the Theater, intercolumnar walls, Central Arch and platform, East and West Interior Staircases and landings, East and West Vaulted Chambers, and the East and West Rear Staircases. Limestone pavement is laid on all new floor areas.
The fill behind the vertical central point in the orchestra retaining wall yielded no inclusions. The fine moist and loose Dark grayish Brown sand (Munsell 10 YR 4/2) balls and is moist to the touch.
Soil behind Locus 11— Central Stone in Locus 4
In the south center in the middle of Locus 4.

oc:metadata.dc:title: Petra Great Temple Excavations: Locus 24 (Locus)
